newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks seen mixed on new accounts day.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks seen mixed on new accounts day.

text.p: Pakistan stocks are likely to open mixed on Tuesday, the new accounts day, mainly on speculative activity, but dealers said overall sentiment would remain weak due to a poor outlook for the economy.

"The index may edge up on new accounts day, but overall sentiment continues to remain weak because of the country's grim economic outlook," dealer Rony Byramjee said. "There is little support from institutions, while investors are also in a wait and see mood." On Monday, the index fell 26.01 points, or 1.68 percent, to end at 1,522.04. Losers led gainers 198 to 29 on turnover of 54 million shares. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
